name: telepathically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that uses telepathy (= the ability to know what is in someone else's mind, or to communicate with someone mentally, without using words or other physical signals): communicate telepathically Our neighbour insists that she is able to communicate telepathically with her cat. My sister and I are so close that often I can almost telepathically pick up on what she is thinking. Related words
telepathy
telepathic
